name: tormod.me
body:
# tormod . me

me. myself. and I. Well not yet. For now it is all about my Machine Extensions!

# Cool stuff for your Dragon or CoCo

Innovative products bringing new life to your good ole home computer

Hardware
* uDW DriveWire microserver
* Dragon **deluxe** DriveWire adapter
* Dragon DriveWire adapters (kit)
* +32KB memory expansion for Dragon 32

For now see the [Sales](http://archive.worldofdragon.org/phpBB3/viewforum.php?f=6) section of the excellent [World of Dragon](http://archive.worldofdragon.org) forums and contact me per e-mail for availability.


Software
* DWLOAD - the easiest way to use DriveWire
* HDBDOS ported to Dragon 32 (can also run from RAM)
* NitrOS-9 for your Dragon 32 (memory extension recommended)
* FUZIX for Dragon or CoCo2

This software can be downloaded for free and is open-source. See the respective web sites for licensing and authorship. There are many contributors, in some cases I am the project maintainer, and/or have written the Dragon port.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
